nodes.text: The Cthon were a troglodytic species that did not rely on visual senses. As such, the weapon known as the flashstick, which emitted a bright flash of blinding light when used, had no effect on them.

The Cthon were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games reference book Gadgets and Gear. The species originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned as simply troglodytes in The Illustrated Star Wars Universe, before eventually recieving the name Cthon in the 2001 novel Darth Maul: Shadow Hunter by Michael Reaves.
